/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is teeming with vehicles, including cars, buses, and trucks, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and blue, reflecting the urban environment and the weather conditions.
